attributes.action: Much less asylum seekers and stopping support for refugee migrants in the UK.
attributes.background: We agree, that is a global refugee crisis - but we shouldn't make it locally. Each day millions of great people go to work and pay taxes. We shouldn't send this money for some one who want to live in benefits. More people, more problems e.g. environment, security, communication.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107142

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
